    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:SXR208_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>SXR208_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Telescopes and spectrographs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teleskope und Spektrographe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Télescopes et spectrographes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Telescópios e spectrographs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Telescopi e spettrografi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τηλεσκόπια και φασματογράφοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Telescopios y espectrógrafos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">This unit looks at how telescopes and spectrographs are designed to improve our ability to observe the universe. You will examine how different technologies have been developed over the last four hundred years to enable us to look deep into space.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">astronomical_images</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Reflectors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Refractors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Spectra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">spectrographs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">telescopes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit betrachtet, wie Teleskope und 
Spektrographe konzipiert sind, um unsere Fähigkeit zu verbessern, das
Universum zu beobachten. Sie überprüfen, wie unterschiedliche 
Technologien über den letzten vierhundert Jahren entwickelt worden 
sind, um uns zu aktivieren, in Platz tief zu schauen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité regarde comment des télescopes et 
les spectrographes sont conçus pour améliorer notre capacité 
d'observer l'univers. Vous examinerez à quel point différentes
technologies ont été développées au cours des quatre cents 
dernières années pour nous permettre d'examiner profondément 
l'espace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade olha como os telescópios e os 
spectrographs são projetados melhorar nossa abilidade de observar o 
universo. Você examinará como as tecnologias diferentes foram 
desenvolvidas sobre os últimos quatro cem anos para nos permitir de 
olhar profundamente no espaço.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità guarda come i telescopi e gli 
spettrografi sono destinati per migliorare la nostra capacità di 
osservare l'universo. Esaminerete come le tecnologie differenti 
sono state sviluppate durante gli ultimi quattrocento anni per 
permetterci di esaminare in profondità spazio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα εξετάζει το πώς τα τηλεσκόπια και οι 
φασματογράφοι σχεδιάζονται για να βελτιώσουν τη δυνατότητά μας να
παρατηρήσουμε τον κόσμο. Θα εξετάσετε πώς οι διαφορετικές 
τεχνολογίες έχουν αναπτυχθεί κατά τη διάρκεια των τελευταίων 
τετρακόσιων ετών για να επιτρέψουν σε μας για να φανούν βαθιούς 
στο διάστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad mira cómo los telescopios y los 
espectrógrafos se diseñan para mejorar nuestra capacidad de observar
el universo. Usted examinará cómo diversas tecnologías se han
desarrollado durante los cuatro cientos años pasados para permitirnos
mirar profundamente en espacio.</string>
          </description>
